name: HIGH STAKES (soldier sorrowful)
description:
DEAL ME IN, OH CHILD OF THE NIGHT


HIGH STAKES is a first person arcade styled game where you beat up vampires and collect tokens. Aim for the lowest time!

Made for the "A Game By It's Cover 2020" game jam
(https://itch.io/jam/a-game-by-its-cover-2020)

Game inspired by Tyler Q Anderson and Jamie C Lee's submission in the My Famicase Exhibition 2020
(http://famicase.com/20/softs/086.html)

Note: Mac/Linux builds are untested. Let me know if they work!
